name: Medusa Frontier
description:
Medusa Frontier is a science fiction themed sandbox game with base construction and some open world survival game elements. As an Early Access product, the game is being developed using a custom "engine" designed to offer a fresh blend of game mechanics where resource gathering, crafting and base construction offer a simple beginning to much more."

CURRENT Early Access Game and Engine features include.
  • Groovy Base Construction.(Click build with cool thunk sound)
  • Resource gathering from Terrain Surface.
  • Shimmer effect that makes Ice Deposits look cool.
  • Auto Stack Inventory and Storage.
  • Custom Graphics engine for smooth gameplay on most GPUs.
  • Custom simple & responsive GUI.
  • There is No character animation, yet.
  • But base construction saving works.
  • This game also has simple terrain collision so players
    and objects do not fall through the ground.
Disclaimer: There is only one "Storage Container" or "Storage Backpack" at the moment.
Disclaimer: This game does not have "voxel" terrain(its height based).
Disclaimer: This game does NOT have Multi-player features.(It is being considered)
Disclaimer: This game does NOT have flying or space flight. (No promise it ever will.)
Disclaimer: This game does NOT have character animation yet.(Options are being considered)
